generated_description: markrichter is a professional photography and filmmaking company based in the netherlands. the company specializes in creating strong visual content for events and businesses. the founder, mark, is a creative player with a clear vision in all facets of his work. he is known for his energy, honesty, and raising the bar for the best shot. mark's photography is diverse and he pays attention to the smaller details, making him a popular choice for clients.

short_description: markrichter is a photographer/photographic studio based in roermond, netherlands.
long_description: mark is a professional photographer and filmmaker in the music industry based in the netherlands. due to his love for skateboarding and it's culture, in which he spend all of his childhood, he developed his love for photography and filmmaking. after his study in 2016 he decided to take it to the next level. with clients like amsterdam dance event, awakenings, audio obscura, extrema network, i am hardstyle and numerous artists he has worked all over the netherlands and abroad.
